content:
From: Carsten Fuhs <c.fuhs@bbk.ac.uk>
The organisers of FSCD 2025 are delighted to announce free best-effort
virtual participation in the 10th International Conference on Formal
Structures for Computation and Deduction (FSCD 2025) in Birmingham, 15 -
18 July 2025.

Please register your email in advance to receive login information for
the live stream. For details, please see the information on the
conference website:

https://fscd-conference.org/2025
